app.title: Lingo-Diff
app.subtitle: Professional text comparison platform
app.tagline: Compare, analyze, and perfect your text with professional-grade tools

textA.label: Text A (Original)
textA.tooltip: Enter the original version of your text. This could be an existing translation, first draft, or current version.

textB.label: Text B (Revised)
textB.tooltip: Enter the revised version of your text. This could be a new translation, edited version, or alternative option.

referenceText.label: Reference Text
referenceText.tooltip: Enter the source or reference text (like the original English). This helps provide context for comparison analysis.

usage.label: Context & Usage
usage.placeholder: e.g., Mobile app button for hotel room selection
usage.tooltip: Describe where and how this text is used. Include UI context, target audience, or any constraints that affect the text choice.

analysis.title: Visual Difference Analysis
analysis.aiDescription: Generate expert analysis prompt for AI evaluation of text differences.
analysis.enterBothTexts: Enter both texts to see differences
analysis.addTextToSee: Add text to both fields to see live character-level differences
analysis.emptyDescription: Add your text versions to see a live comparison

import.label: Import CSV File
import.tooltip: Upload any CSV file with text columns. We'll automatically detect and map your columns intelligently.
import.smartDetection: ‚ú® Smart Detection: Works with any column names in any language
import.separatorDetection: üîç Auto-detects separators: comma, semicolon, tab, pipe
import.commaHandling: üìù Handles commas in text automatically (e.g., "Welcome back, John!")

export.label: Export Data
export.tooltip: Export your comparisons to CSV format. Compatible with Excel, Google Sheets, and all spreadsheet applications.
export.compatibility: üí° Perfect format for Excel with proper UTF-8 encoding

features.title: ‚ú® Smart Import Features:
features.separatorDetection: Auto-detects separators: comma (,), semicolon (;), tab, pipe (|)
features.columnDetection: Automatically detects column types in any language
features.flexibleNames: Works with flexible column names (Original/Revised, A/B, etc.)
features.specialChars: Handles commas, quotes, and special characters seamlessly
features.utf8Support: Perfect UTF-8 support for all international text
features.noTechnical: No technical CSV formatting knowledge required

modal.title: CSV Import Preview
modal.moreRecords: ... and {{count}} more records will be imported

messages.fileTooBig: File too large. Please select a CSV file smaller than 5MB.
messages.noDataExport: No data to export. Add some text comparisons first.

welcome.title: Welcome to Lingo-Diff Pro!
welcome.subtitle: Professional Text Comparison Tool
welcome.description: Professional text comparison and analysis tool. Get instant technical metrics, visual differences, and AI-powered insights for text quality evaluation.
welcome.feature1: Technical Constraints: SMS byte limits, mobile UI space, character limits.
welcome.feature2: Smart Metrics: UTF-8 byte counts, script detection, text expansion analysis.
welcome.feature3: Visual Diff: Character-level comparison with immediate feedback.
welcome.feature4: AI Analysis: Generate expert prompts for LLM quality evaluation.
welcome.feature5: Universal Design: Perfect for localization, content editing, and document comparison.

step1.title: Enter Your Text
step1.description: Add both versions in the boxes below

advancedOptions.title: Advanced Options
advancedOptions.description: Add context information and perform AI analysis for better insights

ai.title: AI Analysis (Beta)
ai.apiKeyNotice: Your API key is stored locally and never sent to our servers.
ai.fillBothTexts: Fill both Text A and Text B to enable analysis
ai.enterApiKey: Enter your API key to enable analysis
ai.analysisDescription: Click to view detailed analysis results
ai.waitCooldown: Please wait 30 seconds between analyses to prevent abuse.
ai.analysisFailed: Failed to analyze text. Please check your API key and try again.
ai.requiresApiKey: ‚Ä¢ Requires external API key (your own account)
ai.qualityDepends: ‚Ä¢ Analysis quality depends on chosen model

clipboard.pleaseProvideText: Please provide text for at least one version before copying.
clipboard.missingContext: You have not provided a Reference Text or Context. The AI's analysis will be less accurate. Do you want to continue?
clipboard.noContext: [No context provided. Assume general text usage.]
